text: 24.47 Ais 49.6, 49.22, Jer 31.34, Mai 4.2, Mal 1.11, Mat 28.19, 1 Ti 3.16 Tɨkjakek, bɨne yɨb ne ak dɨl, kɨli Jelusalem jɨj gɨl, takaw agñɨl ag dad amɨl, takaw anɨb ak binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop agñɨnɨgel agɨlak. Anɨb agñɨnɨgel, Nɨbi tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgem, God tap tɨmel nɨbop tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨgab agñɨnɨgel agɨlak agak.
